column2: really like this place! I went here on a Wednesday so it wasn't very busy.  It was a little after 11 and since they were only serving breakfast inside that's were most of their customers were sitting
column3: but even so there was no wait to be seated.  I had a coffee
column5: and it was just right not too strong
column6: not too weak.  I also had a glass of their fresh orange juice and I loved it
column7: no sugar added! it was like eating an orange!
